title: Anita and Me - complex understanding of mother

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Syal uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex understanding of her mother.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Syal uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex understanding of her mother.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
